title: Is there a way to have different audio for different tabs?
content: Hi, I was just wondering if there's a way to make separate tabs use different output devices without creating a new window with a different profile. Thanks
creator: kianoushluluchichi

title: A Web Page Is Slowing Down Your Browser
content: I keep getting this Yellow Message - A Web Page Is Slowing Down Your Browser. I was getting it with Windows 7. I only had 6GB RAM, so thought it was because I kept running out of RAM. Got a new computer, HP Z230 Tower Desktop PC - Intel Xeon E3-1225 v3 3.20GHz, 32GB DDR3, 480GB SSD, with Windows 10 Prom, and I'm still getting that message. I did all the suggestions on this website to no avail: https://blogs.systweak.com/a-web-page-is-slowing-down-your-browser/ Any suggestions for stopping this?
creator: danedon

title: Disabling Port 80 Causes slow browsing and TLS handshakes
content:
Firefox version 84.0.1 (64-bit)

Closed some ports on my router connected to internet, one of them was port 80. Figured since my systems do not run a web server, nothing should be using it. Nothing else was changed.

Browsing was slow after this and a lot of TLS handshakes showing up in bottom left of Firefox window. Enabled port 80 on the router firewall and browsing back to normal. Also, some pages would not load completely unless I disabled Enhanced Tracking Protection.

Presumably there is some traffic using port 80 when web pages load that makes loading faster.

Seems that port 80 needs to be left open to avoid slowdowns from TLS handshakes. Appears that certificates is part or all of this issue.

Can someone please confirm?

Thank you
creator: gdavis74

title: Wallpaper
content:
How can I magnify a smaller web picture and use it as desktop or wallpaper how can I determine the URL for the picture what is the difference between an embedded picture vs an ordinary picture I have tried to right click the picture but it makes no difference a few years ago if you did a right click you would get a question if you want to make this a desktop/wallpaper no more I use win 10

Thank you Aamir Raza

title: Recently found out about CSS on firefox and want to learn more about using it to customize my browser
content:
I have made the chrome folder and the 2 files that go inside of it just the other day.

And so far I have added a background to my browser new tab page. I also had changed the "Top Sites" to "Dawn's Sites" and the text has been changed as well as the text color.

I had someone I found online make the css and stuff for me since I don't know much about the css stuff myself.

Here is what I want to do I want to know how to make this stuff myself. I just want to know if there is a site where I can find different codes and a site where I can sample the stuff before I change the firefox browser to much and then need to delete the browser and restart everything all over again.

So is there a site that explains more about the whole firefox css thing and any sites on where I can test out different things before I add it to firefox.
creator: dawn121988

title: add-on evernote webclipper
content: Als ik Firefox open, dan opent er een tweede tab, waarin Evernote Webclipper toestemming vraagt om knipsels te maken. Als ik de knop 'allow' in druk, wordt de pagina 'hulp en leren' geopend van Evernote. En dat gebeurt elke keer opnieuw als ik Firefox open. Hoe kom ik hier vanaf?
creator: a.rooij12

title: Bookmarks don't work
content:
In the past, all my booksmarks in FF have been working fine. Recently, many of the old bookmarks don't work anymore. When I click on a bookmark nothing happens. I always have to click on it a second time. Only then the website gets opened. That's annoying.

What's wrong with this?

Thanks, Brandanus
creator: Brandanus
